attributes.action: Keep services fully functional at the Horton General Hospital Banbury
attributes.additional_details: The Horton General Hospital Banbury is a vital service to the community and surrounding vast areas. It is of the upmost importance that this vital service is kept fully functional. On the doorstep, without the major concerns of travelling to Oxford and beyond, which is near on impossible for many people. I ask the government to take into account the economics, population growth and the castatrophic events which will inedibly happen if the Horton is denied the services to work at full strength.
